game.name: お家で甘える社会人彼女の恋愛模様
game.shortDescription: A heartwarming visual novel about a romance with a younger female colleague. Enjoy an authentic office love story between two working adults navigating their careers and their feelings for each other.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A heartwarming visual novel about a romance with a younger female colleague. Enjoy an authentic office love story between two working adults navigating their careers and their feelings for each other.
